summary: Worked as part of a scrum team on Collaboration Center, a multi-tenant B2B SaaS solution that powers collaboration within the mortgage industry.
highlights: Developed and maintained a RESTful APIs using .NET and C# for internal and external integrations.

Designed and implemented an OAuth 2.0 Authorization Code Grant solution using OWIN Katana for .NET, replacing password storage with revocable, scoped access and refresh tokens for secure third-party integrations.
Led the upgrade from ASP.NET Web Forms to Angular, modernizing the UI/UX and increasing maintainability.
Developed a mechanism to embed key features into other web apps using micro frontends, boosting flexibility and reducing time-to-market.
Built a CI pipeline for the Angular SPA using Azure Pipelines, enabling early detection of issues.
Developed a proof of concept for a multi-phase upgrade from .NET Framework to .NET Core, aimed at reducing technical debt and modernizing the platform.
Collaborated with the UI/UX design team to improve accessibility, adhering to WCAG 2.1 Level AA requirements.
